meanings.definition: To form a connection or bond with someone or something for a common purpose.
meanings.sent1: The superheroes were allying to defeat the villain and save the city.
meanings.sent2: The countries were allying to promote peace and cooperation.
meanings.sent3: The cats were allying to catch the mischievous mouse in the house.
meanings.sent4: The students were allying to conquer the challenging math exam together.
meanings.sent5: The flowers were allying with the bees to spread pollen and thrive.
